document_data.name: Moneylender's Guild
document_data.mainbody: The '''Moneylender's Guild''' was located in [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Base of Operations: The guild headquarters was located near the center of Almorel along the [[Golden Way]] next to the [[Vernadsky Fief]]. It was one of the larger compounds to be found within the city..
document_data.Organization: The Moneylender's Guild head guildmaster in {{Yearlink|1357}} was the [[dwarf]] [[Eck Barrelstave]].
